title: Sherpas Squinting through the Moral Matrix of Elephant Land: Topher the Salty
description:
Topher the Salty wins a Randos slot and subsequently gets cold feet at the point of publishing. There will be a part 2 coming in a few days. You won't be dissatisfied. For those of you who don't know Topher he's sharp and articulate. Raised without an overt religion he's been navigating his elephant through the jungles of the Toronto meaning crisis. 

Convo notes: 
One of four brothers, 3rd in the birth order
Live in Toronto

One of the luckiest people on the planet. Canada, Toronto, Beaches, Family

Canadian

Joe Lars

White collar to blue collar
Sheri 

Lost world of the CRC

Pastors as Sherpa

Movement back up and down up and down

Squint method

Know how to listen to people and make and invalid move

Exploration 

Elephant land

Dead reckoning

Homo religiosis

My generation needs to figure it out what you need

What are the intermediate options between the church and their moral matrix. 


Conversation about morality, the real McCoy is church every week
For many people that's too large a step. They're not ready to get married. 
There's a lack of a partial measure between church and nothing. 
For the nones there is no explanation. This server is a version of that. 
Something that isn't going to church ever week. We can wrap this format around our lives. 
It gives and opportunity to do some of that. 

Maybe there's a need for a .5

Where outside of church 

Government is the wrong layer
Better layer is the Sunday dinner table
Squished out middle

Family dinner style is squished out
Where are you having moral conversations in our lives

Besides a moral orientation
